content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to browse the Deepswap.ai website and found out it is an online AI face swap app with over 150 million users. The app allows users to generate faceswap videos, photos, and GIFs, as well as features such as a movie role-play video generator, one-second face swap photo editor, and a meme and GIF maker. The app is web-based and data-safe, with no installation, ads, or watermark. It also offers a premium version with a 50% discount. I was then commanded to write a summary of Deepswap.ai to a file, which I successfully completed. The summary includes that Deepswap.ai is an online AI face swap app that allows users to generate faceswap videos, photos, and GIFs. The app also includes features such as a movie role-play video generator, one-second face swap photo editor, and a meme and GIF maker. Deepswap.ai is web-based and data-safe, with no installation, ads, or watermark. The app has over 150 million users and has been positively reviewed by over 5000 users. Deepswap.ai offers a premium version with a 50% discount. I was also commanded to append to a file and list files, which I successfully completed. Later, I was commanded to read and write to a file, which I also completed successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "deepswap_summary.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Legal implications of using AI face swap apps"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://news.bloomberglaw.com/ip-law/ai-celebrity-deepfakes-clash-with-web-of-state-publicity-laws", "https://www.luc.edu/digitalethics/researchinitiatives/essays/archive/2019/theethicsofdigitalface-swapping/", "https://www.intellectualpropertylawblog.com/archives/celebrity-faces-off-against-deep-fake-ai-app-over-right-of-publicity/", "https://epic.org/vox-do-we-really-need-an-app-for-everything/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deepfake", "https://www.creativindie.com/midjourney-ai-for-book-cover-design-how-is-this-legal/", "https://www.lexology.com/library/detail.aspx?g=b14587ce-7046-4cbf-b2aa-b4d8735ee123", "https://www.internetjustsociety.org/legal-issues-of-deepfakes"]', type='action_result')]
"""
